head.title: Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy | Online School LA

meta.name: description
meta.content: Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy (LAVCA), serves independent learners who love an academic challenge. Enroll now for the upcoming school year!
Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy (LAVCA), serves independent learners who love an academic challenge. Enroll now for the upcoming school year!

h2.a: Enrollment for the 2020–2021 School Year Is Open

div.p: We'd love to welcome your family to the LAVCA community! Apply today.

div.p: Good attendance helps students do well. Start Strong!

img.alt: Logo, Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy, powered by K12
img.title: Logo, Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy, powered by K12

div.p: The place where your child can reach his or her full potential!

img.alt: Zac, Elayna, and Paola, three K12 students
img.title: Zac, Elayna, and Paola, three K12 students

div.p: Through videos, images, and timelines, see an average day in the lives of three very different K12 students.

img.title: Photo of students networking

div.p: Network your way to the college and career options you want!

img.title: Teacher webinar

div.p: A panel discussion with teachers from K12-powered schools. Discover more!

Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy (LAVCA) is available to Louisiana students in grades K–12 through a partnership between K12 Inc. and Community School for Apprenticeship Learning Inc. (CSAL). Founded in 1997, CSAL is a not-for-profit with a mission to provide students with real-world experiences by giving them access to alternative forms of instruction. Since its inception, CSAL has operated a small middle school and high school centered on individualized attention, integrated project-based instruction, and motivating students to do their best. LAVCA is its third charter school.
The Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy and K12 give Louisiana kids in grades K–12 the chance to learn in the ways that are right for them. LAVCA offers:

ul.li: Students may earn college credit while in high school
Compelling, high-interest courses that introduce a variety of possible careers

p.em: LAVCA, in accordance with applicable Federal and State law and school policy, does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, religion, sex, gender identity, pregnancy, physical or mental disability, medical condition, ancestry, marital status, age, sexual orientation, citizenship, or service in the uniformed services.

em.br: Families do not pay tuition for a student to attend an online public school. Common household items and office supplies like printer ink and paper are not provided. Our enrollment consultants can help address your technological and computer questions and needs.

div.p: Copyright © 2020 Louisiana Virtual Charter Academy. All rights reserved.
